vulnerabilities.title: Allocation of Resources Without Limits or Throttling
vulnerabilities.description: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Allocation of Resources Without Limits or Throttling due to an OutOfMemoryError during the handling of a broken Pack200 file. See CVE-2024-26308.

vulnerabilities.title: Information Exposure
vulnerabilities.description: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Information Exposure due to missing validation for the X.500 name of any certificate, subject, or issuer. See CVE-2023-33201.

vulnerabilities.title: Infinite loop
vulnerabilities.description: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Infinite loop in ED25519 verification in the ScalarUtil class. See CVE-2024-30172.
